flawed_nl_solution:
There were 1150-150=<<1150-150=1000>>1000 people who didn't vote for John
That means James got 1000*0.7=<<1000*0.7=70.0>>70.0 votes
So the other candidate got 1000-70.0=<<1000-70.0=930.0>>930.0 votes
This means he got 930.0-150=<<930.0-150=780.0>>780.0 more votes than John.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 700.0, not 70.0. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
